# track.sh

> Shipment tracking for agents. Real-time package status from any carrier.

Base URL: https://track.prim.sh
Auth: x402 (USDC on Base, chain `eip155:8453`)
Status: deployed

## Endpoints

- `POST /v1/track` â€” track a shipment by tracking number and optional carrier.

## Pricing

- Per tracking request.

See human docs at `https://prim.sh/track` for carrier coverage and rate limits.

## Examples

```bash
# Track a shipment
curl -X POST https://track.prim.sh/v1/track \
  -H "X-402-Payment: $TOKEN" \
  -d '{"tracking_number": "1Z999AA10123456784", "carrier": "ups"}'
```
